body:
i'm thankful that though i go through periods where i feel like i don't have the cognitive overhead to listen to music while working, i also have ones where i do, and i'm thankful that yesterday afternoon was a day where i had it and listened to lots of great old rock music. i'm thankful for _[marquee moon](https://open.spotify.com/album/630o1rKTDsLeIPreOY1jqP)_ and _[alien lanes](https://open.spotify.com/album/4agHHI1pV0CUPpV72dYIIv)_ and the deluxe edition of [the third velvet underground album](https://open.spotify.com/album/0PETDnEHDMq9ngALKmuDQA) and [this long playlist](https://open.spotify.com/playlist/6vtJrO8HsStIolE1vGEgxN) devoted to [my favorite beat](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Motorik).

i'm thankful it's friday. 

i'm thankful that though it's been raining a lot, it won't rain forever.
